# Missing values

Quandl only have data that are already cleaned and organized. 

For the interactive part, the data is collected in a Python file and exported into csv.
Only the countries that have all the data of CO2 emission and electricity production between 1970-2014 are included. 

The csv file export and data cleaning is done in 'create_csv.py'. 
The command to run this script is 'python create_csv.py'.

The csv file used for the interactive component is 'data.csv'.
